doc.title: Soundfactory
doc.plot: During the 1990's, if you partied in Manhattan, you know of the Soundfactory nightclub. Famous for its music, sound-system, and dancing, Soundfactory drew the city's most beautiful people, celebrities and international visitors. As the parties grew larger, so did the political persecution of this Manhattan institution. Soundfactory is the unknown story of owner: Richard Grant, and the constant persecution and harassment by those who found his club, an easy target for political gain. Richard served hard-time in prison with murderers and rapists - his crime: throwing the best party possible on Saturday nights in Manhattan.
